Privacy Policy

This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of personal information we receive from users of our app (uPlexa Android: uPlexa Wallet).

By using the app, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

Data Collected

Personal data is any kind of data that could identify an individual.

uPlexakeys and public addresses are collected and processed by the app locally for the purpose of processing transactions and transmitted into the uPlexa Network in encrypted form.

Other personal data is not collected by the app.

If you use the exchange (optional) functionality, uPlexa Wallet may fetch the exchange rate through the public API of coinmarketcap.com (if/when listed). See their privacy policy at https://coinmarketcap.com/privacy for details on how data in your requests is collected.

App Permissions

  • INTERNET : Connect to the uPlexa Network via a uPlexa Daemon Node
  • READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Read wallet files stored on the device
  • WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Write wallet files stored on the device
  • WAKE_LOCK : Keep device awake while syncing
  • CAMERA : Scan QR Codes for receiving uPlexa

Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy in the app and on the website (www.uplexa.com) You are advised to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes.

This Privacy Policy was last updated: 12th January, 2019.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about our privacy policy, or how your data is being collected and processed, please e-mail uplexa@protonmail.com.
